1:
À Dagwi Darwey, wok won hom yaga yɛrɛ shɔt e tē,
wet betong na sesin hom!
Tɛ̀ betong, na hwo wok won hom,
ma sé ra hɛ na yey rining.
2:
E hwo zɔng de hwô tɔk ye, vit a me na nɛn,
yaga e hwo zɔng de hwà tɔk pyɛ de ya sé tsak o.
4:
Hwà tɔk yey hom.
Ka turuk gbak hwà ga ngyɛgɛt me, ko hwà sɛ̀ me vit a nɛn.
Ma ga tùt nu e ra pyɛ́ de bemat behak be ra wɛt.
Ma ga ye ngyɛ́k, na me gyeng badu mō.
Ma raa begwông bemat de ba kat yol wɛt,
5:
ko ma raa begwong mō kayɛ jeng,
ma ye bugurɛk wɛt.
6:
Me ra won na hwo à Dagwi, yaga hwô hanat a me.
Wet betong na ha hom, wok me!
7:
Hwó tɛ̀ yey na me.
Dura hɛ e gwong de gwô tɛ̀ bemat be langat hɛn.
Vwɔ̂ gap mō gwo dul vemo de be jama kwɔ̂n dal na hwo yi na vê repugu mɛn.
8:
Gyeng me, sede hwó gyeng bayis mō.
Dul me, sede congot ye gunung nèy yɛ,
9:
yaga bemat beves be hwosom me,
vê repugu ba ga gwɔrɔ me, na be mɔrɔ me.
10:
Vit a hɛn na nemwishish,
bé rwak nenu zɔng.
11:
Ba ga kaba bol hom!
Kagwa de ma doyo ɛ, a vemo,
be wɛrɛm, na be gang me.
12:
Ba sé sede gukum de wa vɔk cwey ngyāma,
sede gwɔ̀m ngyāma de wa sé e waba.
13:
À Dagwi Darwey, sogo!
Hwo e ra bemât repugu hom, na hwo di wɛng e ra yɛn!
Sey me na wal mō yi e vê neves.
14:
Sey me na vwɔ̂ gap mō
yi na vemo de pyɔlɔ mɛn ya sé e jey yemo zɔng.
Tabak hɛn na reyɔm de hwà ga tik yaga yɛn.
Tik reyɔm o re vey a yɛn,
na nèy mɛn ne bin sɛ̀,
na nèy nèy mɛn ne sɛ̀ bwang o arɔng!
15:
Ko me à me, vit a me na nɛn,
yaga ano, mê di bayis mō à Dagwi Darwey.
Jeng de me sene, yey hom ye pɛngɛ,
yaga hwà sé tanga me.
